sentences.en: Before marriage, platonic love is best.
sentences.cn: 结婚前, 纯精神的恋爱最好.

sentences.en: Can Platonic love really exist in real life?
sentences.cn: 柏拉图式的爱情,在现实世界里到底可能 吗 ?

sentences.en: Even more said it was platonic love.
sentences.cn: 更有甚者说这是柏拉图式的爱情.

sentences.en: For example On Liberty > Platonic dialogues > On Soul > Socrates memoirs >.
sentences.cn: 比如《论自由》、《柏拉图对话集》、《论灵魂》、《苏格拉底回忆录》.

sentences.en: Hostesses are not prostitutes; they are more like paid, platonic girlfriends.
sentences.cn: 舞女并不是妓女; 她们有点象收费的, 柏拉图式的女朋友.

sentences.en: In summary, the Platonic scenario is dominantly inductive deductive, while the Aristotelian scenario is dominantly inductive - abductive.
sentences.cn: 总结一下, 柏拉图研究用的主要方法是归纳和演译方法, 亚里士多德主要是用归纳和溯因方法.

sentences.en: Introspection by a Platonic viewpoint: object modeling.
sentences.cn: 柏拉图式内省: 对象建模.

sentences.en: Isn't it true that your relationship with my client is entirely platonic?
sentences.cn: 你和我的委托人真是保持纯粹精神上的关系 吗 ?
还是让爱情来得更安全些吧.

sentences.en: Many people know his famous allegation of Platonic love.
sentences.cn: 很多人都知道他著名的“柏拉图式爱情”.

sentences.en: Platonic love : Before marriage, Platonic love is best.
sentences.cn: 结婚前,精神恋爱更合适.

sentences.en: She values the platonic friendship she has had with Chris for ten years.
sentences.cn: 她珍惜自己和克里斯之间长达10年的柏拉图式的友情。

sentences.en: That is completely different from what happens in a Platonic perspective.
sentences.cn: 这完全不同于柏拉图观点所要表现的东西.

sentences.en: They even holiday ed together in Mexico but Jennifer insists their relationship is genuine platonic.
sentences.cn: 尽管他们在墨西哥一起度假,但珍妮佛仍坚持表示,他们之间的关系很纯粹,有的只是精神上的交流.

sentences.en: They'd had a close platonic relationship for more than thirty years.
sentences.cn: 他们之间的柏拉图式的亲密关系已有三十多年了.

words.tran_cn: 柏拉图主义；柏拉图哲学；精神恋爱
理想的；柏拉图哲学的；不切实际的；纯精神友谊的

phrases.tran_cn: n. 精神恋爱；柏拉图式恋爱

trans.tran_cn: 柏拉图（哲学）的，理想的，不切实际的，（两性之间关系）纯精神友谊的
trans.tran_en: Platonic relationships or feelings of affection do not involve sex
